item.title: Rack Down
item.content:encoded: A UPS failure at approximately 9:26 this morning caused a server rack to shut down. Most servers have recovered, but some are still experiencing issues, including crucial portions of our infrastructure. We are working to resolve the issue.

item.title: Major Outage
item.content:encoded: Due to power issues, these services and the sites that run on them including all student sites and JupyterHub are unaccessable.

item.title: Mail services experiencing outages
item.content:encoded: Users are reporting trouble using a variety of mail-related services, including accessing the webmail, checking mail through third-party clients, and setting up email forwarding.

item.title: Unexpected server downtime
item.content:encoded: There was unexpected server downtime last night. We apologize for the inconvenience.

item.title: Mailserver maintenance
item.content:encoded: The authentication backend for mailservers is currently under maintenance

item.title: DNS outage
item.content:encoded: We are aware that some DNS servers are not resolving the TJ nameservers properly leading to CSL services not loading.

item.title: Director down
item.content:encoded: Director is down.

item.title: Ion loading slowly
item.content:encoded: Ion is currently experiencing slow load times. We believe this to be linked to backend storage issues.

item.title: Elevated error rates
item.content:encoded:
We are investigating elevated error rates (500s on Ion, error 28 on Director mentioning no free space available).

2021-05-05T02:58:00.000Z
Temporary fix

The cause of this issue has been discovered. A temporary fix has been implemented. We are working on a permanent fix.

item.title: Storage backend upgrades
item.content:encoded: An upgrade to our storage backend will be performed over Spring break. There may be some intermittent periods of time when files stored on the CSL are inaccessible.

item.title: Ion inaccessible
item.content:encoded:
In certain cases, Ion may be inaccessible.

2021-03-23T02:22:58.210Z
Monitoring

A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring for any additional problems that may arise.

2021-03-23T14:15:36.022Z
Resolved

This incident has been resolved.

item.title: Storage cluster outage
item.content:encoded:
There is an outage on our storage cluster.

2021-03-22T14:08:19.119Z
Resolved

This incident has been resolved.

item.title: Ion maintenance
item.content:encoded:
Ion is under maintenance and may be inaccessible at certain times.

2021-02-25T03:00:00.000Z
Maintenance concluded

Maintenance has concluded.

item.title: Director management page not accessible
item.content:encoded:
The Director management page may not be accessible.

::: Resolved | 2021-02-13T00:06:39.038Z This issue has been resolved. :::

item.title: Director inaccessible
item.content:encoded:
Director may be inaccessible at this time. We are looking into the issue.

2021-02-12T22:19:14.819Z
Resolved

This issue has been resolved.

item.title: Cluster maintenance
item.content:encoded: The cluster may be inaccessible for a short period of time while maintenance is being conducted.

item.title: Sending mail to @fcps.edu emails may not work
item.content:encoded: Sending mail to @fcps.edu emails may result in a "Your access to submit messages to this e-mail system has been restricted" message.

item.title: Director degraded performance
item.content:encoded: Director may be laggy or slow during this time. We are looking into the issue.

item.title: Temporary Cluster outage
item.content:encoded: Launching jobs using Slurm or using Jupyterhub may fail.

item.title: Database upgrades
item.content:encoded:
We are upgrading the databases on both Ion and Director. During this period, Ion will be inaccessible, and Director sites' Postgres databases will not be accessible.

2020-12-23T18:30:00.000Z
Maintenance concluded

Maintenance has concluded on both Ion and Director.

item.title: Storage Cluster Upgrades
item.content:encoded: An upgrade of our storage cluster will be performed over Winter Break. Some slowdowns or periods of interruption is expected.
